subclassFeature.name: Oath of the Elements
entries: The Oath of the Elements are for those attuned closer to the pure elemental energies rather than the divinity of the gods.

entries.subclassFeature: Tenets of the Elements|Paladin||Elements|Oath of the Elements|3
Channel Divinity: Elemental Core|Paladin||Elements|Oath of the Elements|3
Channel Divinity: Elemental Resistance|Paladin||Elements|Oath of the Elements|3

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Elemental Core
entries: As an action you channel the Elemental Chaos into your weapon and make a weapon attack, your next attack deals an additional d8 of damage for half of your paladin level rounded down of your selected element type. This stacks with smites and causes any damage of the same type to ignore resistances.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Elemental Resistance
entries: You channel the Elemental Chaos into yourself, gain resistance to all physical and nonmagical damage for 1 min, Gain a elemental ward that allows you to block one instance of elemental damage

subclassFeature.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed depending on your elemental alignment.

subclassFeature.name: Fire
entries: Your Core is infused with fire, you deal fire damage with Elemental Core and you gain the following oath spells

subclassFeature.name: Water
entries: Your Core is infused with water, you deal lightning damage with Elemental Core and you gain the following oath spells

entries.caption: Water Spells
rows: {@spell Remove Curse}, {@spell Create Food and Water}
{@spell Dispel Evil and Good}, {@spell Circle of Power}

subclassFeature.name: Earth
entries: 你的核心被地球灌注，你用元素核心造成雷电伤害，并获得以下誓约法术 (Elemental Core)。

entries.caption: Earth Spells
rows: {@spell Zone of Truth}, {@spell Protection from Poison}

subclassFeature.name: Air
entries: 你的核心充满了空气，你使用元素核心造成辐射伤害，你获得以下誓言法术 (Elemental Core)。

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of the Elements
entries: 一个接受元素誓约的圣武士有以下原则要遵守，即使确切措辞会有所不同。

entries.name: Bring the Storm
entries: Explore the world as you see fit, bring your justice to all lands.

entries.name: Elemental Restoration
entries: 始终努力恢复元素生物在物质平面的存在 ($elementals$).

entries.name: Eternal Vanguard
entries: Know your people, protect those who would help you and others eternally at any cost

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Aura
entries: 元素光环：你与元素的调和让你能够生成一个根据你选择的元素而定的光环。 (Elemental Aura)
你可以使用这个能力的次数等于你的魅力调整值。当你完成一次长休时，你恢复所有已用次数。 (dnd运行组规则)

rows: You summon a blaze to your side. As a bonus action, you may target an object within 20 ft, it suffers the effects of 2nd level heat metal while your aura is active. This increases to 3rd level heat metal at 10th level and 4th level at 20th level
你召唤战争迷雾来帮助你战斗。你制造出一团厚厚的迷雾，周围10英尺范围内只有你和另一只选择的生物能看得见。任何无法在迷雾中看清的生物在感知检定和攻击投掷中都具有劣势。这个迷雾被视为魔法效果，可以被驱散。(DND running group)(English)
You command the earth to protect yourself or your allies. One target within 10ft gains +1 AC while your aura is active. This increases to +2 AC at 10th level and +3 AC at 20th level.

You summon a personal gale. Enemies within 5 ft of you must make a Str save, DC equal to your spell DC. If they fail they are blown away up to 10 ft away from you. As an action you can focus the gale to one creature you can see within 15 ft and they gain its effects while you lose them.

subclassFeature.name: Share the Elements
entries: When you cast a smite spell, as a reaction apply it to an allys weapon within 20 ft for their next turn. The damage they deal is equal to your spells damage roll and it is dealt in your elemental archetype according to elemental core.

subclassFeature.name: Overload
entries: At 20th level, Once per long rest you may overload your elemental core ability. It is now a channel for 1 minute effect and your weapon gains a +2 to attack rolls and damage. Your weapon is considered a magical weapon for purposes of resistance.
